code:
const generateSalesReport=(sales,topProducts,timeRange)=>{// Calcular totales por método de pago const paymentMethods={cash:{label:'Efectivo',total:0,count:0},debit:{label:'Débito',total:0,count:0},credit:{label:'Crédito',total:0,count:0},mp:{label:'Mercado Pago',total:0,count:0},current_account:{label:'Cuenta Corriente',total:0,count:0},paid_current_account:{label:'Cta. Cte. Pagada',total:0,count:0}};sales.forEach(sale=>{paymentMethods[sale.paymentMethod].total+=sale.total;paymentMethods[sale.paymentMethod].count+=1;});// Generar ventana flotante con el "PDF" (simulado) const pdfWindow=window.open('','_blank');// Crear contenido del PDF simulado const title="Reporte de Ventas ".concat(timeRange==='day'?'Diario':timeRange==='week'?'Semanal':timeRange==='month'?'Mensual':'Anual');const totalSales=sales.reduce((sum,sale)=>sum+sale.total,0);const totalItems=sales.reduce((sum,sale)=>sum+sale.items.reduce((itemSum,item)=>itemSum+item.quantity,0),0);const dateRange=timeRange==='day'?"Fecha: ".concat(new Date().toLocaleDateString()):"Desde: ".concat(new Date(timeRange==='week'?new Date().setDate(new Date().getDate()-7):timeRange==='month'?new Date().setMonth(new Date().getMonth()-1):new Date().setFullYear(new Date().getFullYear()-1)).toLocaleDateString()," - Hasta: ").concat(new Date().toLocaleDateString());let content=" ".concat(title,"

").concat(title,"

MiniMarket Pro - CRM para Minimercados

").concat(dateRange,"

Resumen General

Ventas Totales: ").concat(sales.length,"

Productos Vendidos: ").concat(totalItems," unidades

Monto Total: $").concat(totalSales.toFixed(2),"

Medios de Pago

").concat(Object.values(paymentMethods).map(method=>"
".concat(method.label,": ").concat(method.count," ventas - $").concat(method.total.toFixed(2),"
")).join(''),"
TOTAL: $").concat(totalSales.toFixed(2),"

Ventas Detalladas

").concat(sales.map(sale=>" ")).join(''),"
Fecha Cliente Productos Cantidad Total M\xE9todo Pago Comprobante
".concat(new Date(sale.date).toLocaleDateString()," ").concat(sale.customerName||'Consumidor Final'," ").concat(sale.items.map(item=>item.name).join(', ')," ").concat(sale.items.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+item.quantity,0)," $").concat(sale.total.toFixed(2)," ").concat(sale.paymentMethod==='cash'?'Efectivo':sale.paymentMethod==='debit'?'Débito':sale.paymentMethod==='credit'?'Crédito':sale.paymentMethod==='mp'?'Mercado Pago':sale.paymentMethod==='current_account'?'Cuenta Corriente':'Cta. Cte. Pagada'," ").concat(sale.invoiceType==='ticket'?'Ticket':sale.invoiceType==='A'?'Factura A':sale.invoiceType==='B'?'Factura B':'Factura C',"

Productos m\xE1s vendidos

").concat(topProducts.map(product=>" ")).join(''),"
Producto Cantidad Ventas ($)
".concat(product.name," ").concat(product.quantity," unidades $").concat(product.revenue.toFixed(2),"

Generado el ").concat(new Date().toLocaleString(),"

");pdfWindow.document.write(content);pdfWindow.document.close();};const generateCashRegisterReport=(cashMovements,timeRange)=>{const pdfWindow=window.open('','_blank');const title="Reporte de Caja ".concat(timeRange==='day'?'Diario':timeRange==='week'?'Semanal':timeRange==='month'?'Mensual':'Anual');const filteredMovements=cashMovements.filter(m=>{const moveDate=new Date(m.date);const now=new Date();if(timeRange==='day'){return moveDate.toDateString()===now.toDateString();}else if(timeRange==='week'){const weekAgo=new Date(now);weekAgo.setDate(weekAgo.getDate()-7);return moveDate>=weekAgo;}else if(timeRange==='month'){const monthAgo=new Date(now);monthAgo.setMonth(monthAgo.getMonth()-1);return moveDate>=monthAgo;}else if(timeRange==='year'){const yearAgo=new Date(now);yearAgo.setFullYear(yearAgo.getFullYear()-1);return moveDate>=yearAgo;}return true;// 'all' });let content=" ".concat(title,"

").concat(title,"

MiniMarket Pro - CRM para Minimercados

Generado el ").concat(new Date().toLocaleString(),"

Movimientos de Caja

").concat(filteredMovements.map(m=>" ")).join(''),"
Fecha Tipo Usuario Total Esperado Diferencia Estado
".concat(new Date(m.date).toLocaleString()," ").concat(m.type==='opening'?'Apertura':'Cierre'," ").concat(m.user," $").concat(m.total.toFixed(2)," ").concat(m.expectedTotal?"$".concat(m.expectedTotal.toFixed(2)):'-'," ").concat(m.difference?"$".concat(m.difference.toFixed(2)):'-'," ").concat(m.status==='open'?'Abierta':'Cerrada',"

Generado el ").concat(new Date().toLocaleString(),"

");pdfWindow.document.write(content);pdfWindow.document.close();};const generateCurrentAccountReport=(customers,timeRange)=>{const pdfWindow=window.open('','_blank');const title="Reporte de Cuentas Corrientes ".concat(timeRange==='day'?'Diario':timeRange==='week'?'Semanal':timeRange==='month'?'Mensual':'Anual');let content=" ".concat(title,"

").concat(title,"

MiniMarket Pro - CRM para Minimercados

Generado el ").concat(new Date().toLocaleString(),"

Clientes con Deuda

").concat(customers.map(c=>" ")).join(''),"
Cliente DNI Tel\xE9fono Deuda Total
".concat(c.name," ").concat(c.lastName||''," ").concat(c.dni||'-'," ").concat(c.phone||'-'," $").concat(c.totalDebt.toFixed(2),"

Generado el ").concat(new Date().toLocaleString(),"

");pdfWindow.document.write(content);pdfWindow.document.close();};export{generateSalesReport,generateCashRegisterReport,generateCurrentAccountReport};
